body:
Hello @Morgan243! Thanks for updating the PR.



 - In the file [`pandas/tests/plotting/test_frame.py`](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/4642a2d2c5f3e84765c3c7dd3aec57f771ac9ba8/pandas/tests/plotting/test_frame.py), following are the PEP8 issues :

> [Line 294:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/4642a2d2c5f3e84765c3c7dd3aec57f771ac9ba8/pandas/tests/plotting/test_frame.py#L294): [E741](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E741) ambiguous variable name 'l'
> [Line 302:9](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/4642a2d2c5f3e84765c3c7dd3aec57f771ac9ba8/pandas/tests/plotting/test_frame.py#L302): [E741](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E741) ambiguous variable name 'l'



##### Comment last updated on July 15, 2017 at 20:25 Hours UTC
